short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See the number of frequent flyer miles you could earn with Expedia, Orbitz, Travelocity, Hotwire, and more! (all unaffiliated)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Where to Credit shows you the number of miles you could earn on any frequent flyer program!  Search for your flights on Expedia, Orbitz, Travelocity, Hotwire, Cheaptickets, Hotels.com, AARP, Wotif, ebookers, MrJet or SNCF, and our Mileage Calculator will show you how many miles you'll earn for each result.  Quickly compare prices and miles to make sure you never miss a mileage earning opportunity again!
